Description: Pottery ostracon: fragment of a vase. On the recto (convex) remains of eleven lines of a prayer to Amun, faint and flaked off in several places. On the verso, almost completely washed off, traces of several lines of an administrative text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (388704) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/388704)
